original_text: And he shall take the two goats, and present them before the Lord at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 또 그 두 염소를 가지고 회막 문 여호와 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: And he shall take the two goats
and present them before the Lord
at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
